summary: The diff implements most of the required features: a Header component with Login/Logout buttons, post-login redirect logic, admin route guards, and admin-only UI elements. However, there is no evidence that the backend's isAdmin function was updated with the correct admin principal ID for rkj.jain2204@gmail.com (REQ-4). The backend/main.mo diff is truncated and does not show any changes to an admin principal constant. Additionally, a separate LoginButton component was created that duplicates auth logic already present in the Header.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the backend's isAdmin function or authorization check correctly identifies the principal associated with rkj.jain2204@gmail.com and returns true only for that principal. Verify the admin principal ID stored in the backend matches the one produced by Internet Identity for rkj.jain2204@gmail.com.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo diff is truncated and shows no changes to an admin principal constant or isAdmin function. There is no evidence that the hardcoded principal ID was updated or verified to match rkj.jain2204@gmail.com's Internet Identity principal.

hallucinated_features.description: A separate LoginButton component (LoginButton.tsx) was created in addition to the Header component, which already contains full Login/Logout functionality. This duplicates authentication logic without being requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request only asked for Login/Logout controls in the navigation bar. Creating a redundant standalone LoginButton component that duplicates the auth flow was not requested.
